pages.text: 37|127|Daga kare-ra wa kare (iruyasu) o uso-tsukidearu to shita. Dakara kanarazu (shobatsu ni) nozomudearou.
37|128|(Kare-ra no naka) keiken'na, arra no shimo be wa betsudearu.
37|129|Ware wa ato no iku sedai ni watari, kare no tame ni (kono shukufuku o) tometa.
37|130|`Iruyasu ni heian'are.'(To itte).
37|131|Kono yo ni ware wa, tadashi okonai o suru mono ni mukuiru.
37|132|Hontoni kare wa shinjinbukai waga shimo bedeatta.
37|133|Ruto mo (ware ga) tsukawashita monodeatta.
37|134|Miyo, ware wa kare to sono kazoku no subete o sukutta.
37|135|Ato ni nokoru mono no naka ni ita, roba no soto wa.
37|136|Soshite ware wa,-gai no mono o horoboshite shimatta.
37|137|Anata gata wa kare-ra no (iseki no) katawara o, hiru
37|138|yoru kayotte iru. Anata gata wa sore demo satoranai no ka.
37|139|Hontoni yunusu mo, shitodeatta.
37|140|Kare ga (ni o) mansai shita fune ni (notte) nogareta toki,
37|141|kare wa kuji o hiite, makete shimatta.
37|142|(Soshite umi ni nagekoma reruto) taigyo ni marunomi ni sa re, kare wa jiseki no nen ni kara reta.
37|143|Kare ga (kaigo shite omo o) tataenakattanaraba,
37|144|kare-ra (hitobito) ga (fukkatsu shite) okosa reru hi made, kanarazu kare wa sakana no haranouchi ni tomattadearou.
37|145|Daga ware wa, arehateta (kishibe) ni kare o uchiageta. Kare wa yande ita.
37|146|Ware wa kare no ue ni, 1-pon no Hisago ki o shigera se (kage o tsukutta).
37|147|Soshite 10 man-ri, matawa sore ijo (no min) ni kare o tsukawashita.
37|148|Kare-ra ga shinko ni haittanode, ware wa shibashi gense no kyoraku o yurushita.
37|149|Sate kare-ra ni toe. `Anata gata no omo wa musume o mochi, kare-ra (makka no tashinkyo to) wa musuko o motsu to iu no ka.
37|150|Soretomo kare-ra wa, ware ga tenshi-tachi o on'na ni tsukutta to shogen suru no ka.'
37|151|Miyo, kare-ra no iu koto wa tsukurigotodearu.
37|152|Arra ga ko o umareru to wa, kare-ra mo uso-tsuki no todearu.
37|153|Kare wa musuko yori mo, musume o erabareru to suru no ka.
